title: Modern 2 BD Downtown Condo Available Furnished or Unfurnished!!!
posting_body: ['BEDROOMS', '2 Bed', 'BATHROOMS', '1 Bath', 'SIZE', '788', 'DESCRIPTION', '*Currently tenant occupied until 8/29, showings will be limited*', 'VIRTUAL TOUR:', 'If the link does not appear below, the platform you are viewing this listing has blocked it from appearing.', ' Please contact us directly for a link to the virtual tour.', '<URL>', 'Video Walkthrough:', 'https://youtu.be/WP8kiHa7SF8', 'RENTAL DESCRIPTION:', 'Comfortable and modern 2 Bedrooms in the heart of the Financial District available FURNISHED and UNFURNISHED.', 'Well designed open air floor plan provides a seamless transition from Kitchen to the combination Dining and Living area.', ' Near floor-to-ceiling windows in the living and bedroom space allow for ample natural light throughout the day.', 'The warm comfortable carpeting of the bedroom complements the hardwood flooring of the kitchen and living areas.', 'Modern lighting, finishes and colors of the kitchen continue into a very spacious bathroom giving this studio an upscale feel deserving of your next home.', 'Laundry in the building & water, sewage, garbage included in rent price.', 'ABOUT US:', 'KeyOpp is a Family Owned and Community Focused Property Management & Investments Company helping improve lives through KeyOpp-ortunities in Real Estate.', "We have a keen understanding of the importance of balancing and maintaining healthy relationships with our Resident community while also ensuring an effective return for our Client's Real Estate Investment.", 'Learn more about our Leasing, Property Management and Investment services at <URL>', 'UNIT AMENITIES', 'Cable, Dishwasher, Hardwood floors, Heat - electric, Laundry room / hookups, Refrigerator, Stove and oven']
